etymology.description: 信 (trust) + 義 (righteousness) + 區 (district) = a Taipei district named “Xinyi.”
etymology.interpretation: Proper noun for an administrative district of Taipei. 信義 conveys virtues of trust and righteousness, and 區 marks it as a district-level area.
etymology.simplification: In simplified Chinese, 義 → 义 and 區 → 区 to reduce strokes; Mainland writes 信义区, while Taiwan keeps 信義區.

examples.chinese: 信义区(信義區)是台北市(臺北市)的商业中心(商業中心)。
examples.pinyin: Xìnyì Qū shì Táiběi Shì de shāngyè zhōngxīn.
examples.english: Xinyi District is the commercial center of Taipei City.

examples.chinese: 我们住在信义区(我們住在信義區)，靠近台北101(臺北101)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen zhù zài Xìnyì Qū, kàojìn Táiběi yī líng yī.
examples.english: We live in Xinyi District, close to Taipei 101.

examples.chinese: 从信义区(從信義區)到松山机场(松山機場)坐捷运(坐捷運)很方便。
examples.pinyin: Cóng Xìnyì Qū dào Sōngshān Jīchǎng zuò Jiéyùn hěn fāngbiàn.
examples.english: Taking the MRT from Xinyi District to Songshan Airport is very convenient.
